name: Diderik van Wingerden
cooked: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I believe that our question was formulated incorrectly. We were looking for examples of existing SMEs that already have an established ‘closed/proprietary’ product line and then move towards OSHW. We were not looking for SMEs that already went ‘open’ from the start.
raw: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I believe that our question was formulated incorrectly. We were looking for examples of existing SMEs that already have an established 'closed/proprietary' product line and then move towards OSHW. We were not looking for SMEs that already went 'open' from the start.
